Reference

Installation

Functions to help install the Python Altair library

install_altair()

Install Altair Python package

has_altair()

Detect Altair installation

Charts

Functions and objects to construct chart-specifications

alt

Altair object

vega_data

Vega datasets

r_to_py

Convert an R object to Python

`|`(<altair.vegalite.v2.api.TopLevelMixin>) `+`(<altair.vegalite.v2.api.TopLevelMixin>) `&`(<altair.vegalite.v2.api.TopLevelMixin>)

Altair plot concatenation

Tooltips

Functions to create tooltip-specifications

vega_tooltip() vega_tooltip_encoding() vega_tooltip_all()

Create a Vega tooltip-specification

add_field()

Add a field to a Vega tooltip-specification

Examining and Rendering

Functions for examining specifications, and for rendering them into htmlwidgets

examine()

Examine a specification

vegalite()

Create a Vega-Lite htmlwidget

vega_embed()

Vega embed options

only_actions()

Helper function for vega_embed actions

renderVegalite()

Render a shiny output for Vega-Lite

vegaliteOutput()

Shiny output for Vega-Lite
